Service Details: - Gives organizations, families, individuals, clubs and community groups the opportunity to assist the City in keeping Kelowna’s streams healthy by adopting a portion of a stream for at least two years- Duties include picking up litter along the stream a minimum of twice per year
Address & Map: 1435 Water StKelowna, BC     V1Y 1J4View MapQuest Map
Accessibility: Fully Accessible - accessible entrance to City Hall is located off Queensway
